question.xref: DES s6, HC r299, KYTS p27
question.text: Your vehicle has broken down on an automatic railway level crossing. What should you do FIRST?

explanation.text: Firstly get yourself and anyone else well away from the crossing. If there’s a railway phone use that to get instructions from the signal operator. Then if there’s time move the vehicle clear of the crossing.

answer.text: Get everyone out of the vehicle and clear of the crossing
Telephone your vehicle recovery service to move it
Walk along the track to give warning to any approaching trains
Try to push the vehicle clear of the crossing as soon as possible
